page.title: 13RURAL EMPLOYMENT
page.content: The farming community employ some local people on a full time and seasonal basis. Inevitably there are agricultural engineers., 2 small firms and a dairy equipment maintenance firm again with a small workforce. Another local employer is a timber yard. In Bodle Street we have two fruit and vegetable growers who sell to the retail and wholesale trade in Eastbourne but also do a limited amount of pick-your-own.There are two selfemployed car maintanance engineers working from home as does a local caterer employing local ladies when necessary. Some villagers commute to local towns like Hailsham, Bexhill, and Eastbourne, a smaller number commuting to London using mainly rail transport. About one third of the villagers are retired.
